Cases

The tumor is present in the left temporal lobe and nearby inferior fronto-occipital fasiculusl tract. Fiber bundle are obtained by using 150 variations of the same bundle based on uncertainty simulation.
The results below shows 100% of the resulting fiber variations. Based on the resulting fiber tracts, please answer the questions based on your judgements.

Q Based on the resulting fiber tracts, do you think the margins are enough to choose the awake procedure for the tumor resection surgery?
Q How confident are you about your decision?
Q Do the presented fiber tracts affect the clinical decisions, for example, the resection path?
Q How confident are you about your decision?
